query:
-- Actualizar metadata de experimentos B-1 y C-1
UPDATE experiments
SET 
  metadata = JSON_SET(
    COALESCE(metadata, '{}'),
    '$.data_integrity', 'verified',
    '$.audit_integrity', 'legacy_broken',
    '$.audit_version', 'dev-corrupted',
    '$.audit_note', 'Audit chain broken during development phase. Data integrity verified independently. Audit logs isolated in auditLogs_dev_corrupted table.'
  )
WHERE experiment_id IN ('B-1-1770592429287', 'C-1-1770595741129');

-- Verificar actualización
SELECT 
  experiment_id,
  regime_type,
  status,
  JSON_EXTRACT(metadata, '$.data_integrity') as data_integrity,
  JSON_EXTRACT(metadata, '$.audit_integrity') as audit_integrity,
  JSON_EXTRACT(metadata, '$.audit_version') as audit_version
FROM experiments
WHERE experiment_id IN ('B-1-1770592429287', 'C-1-1770595741129');
